DOC.detailed_description: Short-acting GnRH-a administer daily since mid-luteal phase pituitary down-regulation . 14 day down-regulation , serum level follicle stimulate hormone ( FSH ) , luteinizing hormone ( LH ) E2 measure . Meanwhile , 2ml peripheral blood preserve SNP analysis GnRH receptor gene . Once patient judge achieve pituitary down-regulation , ovarian stimulation start . B-mode ultrasonography determination hormone level perform regularly accord course follicle maturation . An appropriate dose human menopause gonadotropin ( HMG ) ( 75~150IU ) add follicle large 12~14mm diameter . When one lead follicle > 18mm diameter , two follicle > 17mm diameter , three follicle > 16mm diameter , final ovulation trigger single injection human chorionic gonadotropin ( HCG ) 4,000~10,000 IU Ovidrel® 250μg ( equivalent HCG 6,500IU ) .Oocyte retrieval guide vaginal ultrasonography conduct 35~36 hour HCG Ovidrel®injection.Fertilization embryo culture perform accord standard IVF intracytoplasmic sperm injection ( ICSI ) protocol.Embryo transfer cryopreservation perform 3~5 day oocyte retrieval . Luteal support provide embryo transfer accord Center 's routine practice . Serum β-HCG level measure 12~14 day embryo transfer determine biochemical pregnancy , transvaginal ultrasonography perform 4~5 week embryo transfer determine clinical pregnancy . For data analysis , patient divide two group accord serum LH level day 14 pituitary down-regulation - one group patient LH level median group another group patient LH level median group.Comparisons make two group follow aspect : 1 ) age ; BMI ; basal level LH , FSH prolactin ( PRL ) ; serum level FSH , LH , E2 progesterone day HCG injection ; number oocytes retrieve , number cleavage , number transferrable embryo , number embryo transfer clinical pregnancy rate ; 2 ) genotyping result 11 SNP locus GnRH receptor gene .
